Body: Any fake language. It doesn't have to be a fake langauge with a fan community like Esperanto or Klingon. A fake language can also be of the sort that Chomskian grammarians study, like a language consisting of only a and b which combine according to a grammar. The later variety have prestige in academia, the former have enthusiasts that try to use them like natural languages. Depending on your goals, you might use one the other or invent yet another mini-fake language.
